fieldHint.hint1: My target audience is a / an _____.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 outcome / big result they really want? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: make a ton of sales through your funnel; write a best-selling book, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Who or what would they already need to be in order to accomplish this big result?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: an experienced copywriter (it takes really good copy to make sales these days); a published author selling at least 30 books a day (900+ books a month), etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What would they have to be willing to do to get the big result the "traditional" or "hard" way? (Difficult / long)

fieldHint.hint1: Are you willing or able to _____.?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: spend years of study and invest the time to learn how to write sales copy from scratch; sit down and "gut it out" at the keyboard 8-10 hours a day for the next several months, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: If they had unlimited resources, what would their option be to pay someone to get this result for them?

fieldHint.hint1: If you have the money, you can _____.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: pay a copywriter thousands of dollars to write your sales copy for you; spend thousands of dollars on a ghost writer to write your book for you, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the option you want them to take after all the other options fail?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Buy Funnel Scripts; Take the 7-Day Free Trial For 3 Hour Kindle Book Wizard, etc.
